about_the_game:
If you like the game you can buy the DLC "Supporter pack". This DLC supports the developer.

DLC Features :
  • A winter theme for the game board
  • Supporter’s badge in the general leaderboard
  • New visual effects when a bomb is dropped on you
  • More detailed statistics about your ranked games
  • 3 new Steam achievements
  • An "extreme" level of difficulty for the single-player mode

We would like to thank you for your support!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer (32bits or 64bits)
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A NVIDIA or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 512 MB of dedicated video memory
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer (32bits or 64bits)
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A NVIDIA or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 1GB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: The « Supporter pack » is a DLC that adds some features and supports the developer.
